description: Try our easy to follow Crumbed Onion Rings recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Onion rings,Pescatarian,Halal,High fibre,Low salt,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Peanut free
name: Crumbed Onion Rings Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Separate onion into rings. Place flour, egg and breadcrumbs in separate shallow bowls.
Lightly coat each onion ring in flour, dip in egg and coat in breadcrumbs. Place on a baking paperlined tray.
Heat oil in a medium saucepan over mediumhigh heat. Test oil temperature by dropping in a small piece of bread. It should turn golden in 30 seconds.
Lower onion rings, in batches, into oil and cook for 2 minutes or until golden.
Remove from oil with a slotted spoon and drain well on a paper towellined plate. Serve with lime wedges.
